endpoints.description: Create and define a new healthcare questionnaire for assessments.
Retrieve a list of available questionnaires and their details.
Retrieve specific questionnaire details by its unique identifier.
Update the structure or content of an existing questionnaire.
Remove an existing questionnaire from the system.
Submit responses to a specific questionnaire for analysis.
View analysis and results of submitted questionnaire responses by identifier.
Retrieve aggregated insights and trends based on questionnaire data.
Initiate monitoring for a patient based on tailored assessments.
Retrieve data from ongoing monitoring of a specific patient for evaluations.
